Name: Minimum time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants without any reviewer-related delays (e.g., no \Reviewer Declined\, \No Response\, or reminder activities)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include \Assign a Different Editor\ versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to reach SW-Reviewer Agreed after Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants where reviewers are successfully assigned
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment, compared with the duration from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average time for Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to be followed by Manuscript Export Succeeded, and how this interval correlates with the subsequent time to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Total resolution time of the segment starting at Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and ending at SW-Reviewer Agreed in complex variants involving multiple reviewer declines or reminders
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants without any reviewer-related delays (e.g., no Reviewer Declined, No Response, or reminder activities)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include Assign a Different Editor versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation until the first occurrence of SW-AE Assign Reviewers, and its relationship to the eventual time to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that pass through SW-Initial Reviewer Selection versus those that skip it
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time of Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to the start of the case, and its impact on the duration until SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Cycle time of the phase initiated by Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and concluded by SW-Reviewer Agreed, considering only cases that eventually reach an EIC decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include plagiarism-related activities (e.g., Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded) versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name to identify outlier cases with unusually long or short durations
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
